Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Text table 4.  Trends in age at admission and time served among the sentenced State prisoners, 1995-2002

Note: Data based on the National Corrections Reporting Program, 1995-2002. Mean age at admission represents the average age of inmates admitted in each year with a sentence of greater than 1 year. Mean time served represents the average time served in prison by sentenced inmates released for the first time on the current offense.
